external_games.name: VRC PRO Welkom Arena 2018 Worlds track pack (2)

name: VRC Pro: Welkom Arena 2018 Worlds Track Pack 2
summary: The Welkom Arena, home of the 2018 IFMAR Worlds 1:10 and 1:12 electric. Located in Welkom South Africa, the Welkom Arena is one of the biggest indoor facilities in the world and allows even for nitro racing! This track pack contains the 1:10 ISTC Worlds and the 1:12 sportscars Worlds lay-out.
